hints_html:
First plot the neighbourhood of the critical points and use the results from 7c.

Then fill in the remaining areas by calculating the derivative of the solution at exemplary points.

question: 7 (d)
sols_raw: :[[File:Fig 215 2011 7d new.jpg|400px|Phase space, in grey the eigenvectors of the linearized systems are plotted]]
statement_html:
Consider the system of equations

\[\begin{aligned} x' &= x(2-x-y) \\ y' &= y(1-x)\end{aligned}\]

(d) Sketch the phase portrait of the non-linear system.
statement_raw:
Consider the system of equations

:<math>
\begin{align}
x' &= x(2-x-y) \\
y' &= y(1-x)
\end{align}
</math>

'''(d)''' Sketch the phase portrait of the non-linear system.
